### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0) with a small electric pole nearby.

### Stone Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0).

### Stone Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0).

### Stone Furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0).

### Lab at position
Consists of a lab with an automation science pack inserted.

### Steam Engine at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position(x=5.5, y=0.5) connected to a small electric pole.

### Offshore Pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5) with a pipe connected to it.

### Pipe Group
Consists of a pipe group connecting the offshore pump to the steam engine.

### Electricity Group
Consists of an electricity group with a small electric pole at position(x=3.5, y=0.5) connected to the steam engine.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you have the required item in your inventory before attempting to place an entity.
- Make sure to move to the target position before placing an entity to avoid distance errors.

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure you have the required ingredients and recipes before attempting to craft an item.
- Be aware of the item names and avoid typos, for example, 'SciencePack1' should be 'automation-science-pack'.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are compatible and can be connected.
- Check the connection points and fluid systems of the entities before attempting to connect them.

### Errors when harvesting resources
- Ensure you are within reach of the resource you want to harvest.
- Check your surroundings and move to the resource if necessary.

### Errors when inserting items
- Ensure the item you want to insert is in your inventory.
- Check the entity's input and output slots before attempting to insert an item.
